title: Textile, ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
Mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
description: Panel of thin glazed chintz with ground in grey, with naturalistic flower clusters in lavender, rose and blue-green. Background has a streaked or cracked ice effect. Right side scalloped

Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
Mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-36.
